nodes.text: The New Javis system was a star system located in the Tapani sector's Pelagia Province, on the Calipsa Run. Prior to the rise of the Galactic Empire, the system was part of Pelagia Province. After House Mecetti decimated House Pelagia, New Javis system was taken over by House Calipsa. The system had the second highest population in Calipsa Province next only to Calipsa itself. After the rise of the New Order, the system was annexed by Calipsa Province.
